name: Succulent (Solawk)
description:
These are sure some juicy targets.

Start by popping bubbles and collecting juice to load your weapon and survive the endless onslaught. Handy vortex will suck in and deliver the succulent juices where you command it to!

Controls:

A/D to move. Double tap to dash. You are briefly invulnerable when dashing.

W or Space to jump. Character can double jump.

Left Mouse Button to shoot. Your bullets gain various effects depending on what juices you've collected. Having a large portion of one type will result in some juicy effects!

Hold Right Mouse Button to summon the vortex and suck juices towards the crosshair. Collect juice to prepare the next reload and also restore health.

R to reload when you have some juice collected.

WebGL Unity builds are funky with sound, truly sorry if you experience a problem with the music playback. Any other bugs – consider those features and you are free to abuse them.

Game by Alex "Solawk" Khanov.

Sounds made using jsfxr.

Made for Juice Jam II (2023).
